name: mern-jmfc-website
description: A MERN Stack parody sports club website for tracking our Soccer game. JMFC (Jungle Monkey Football Club) is not a real team, but this project is a full-stack demo that blends leaderboards, player stats, fake sponsors, and highlight videos into one interactive club hub.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
